about_the_game:
Who doesn’t want a creepy companion that’ll leave you howling for more? Get a Glamorous Howlug Companion, a heaping helping of Bronze Companion Eggs & more.

INCLUDES

  • Glamorous Howlug Companion
  • 25x Crystal Pinatas
  • 10x Accelerite
  • 5x Bronze Companion Eggs
  • 2x Lodestars
